00006  * implementation of what a singleton should be, especially the suff at
00007  * the top of the file, the pinstance stuff took a while to figure out
00008  * remember, stay DRY (Don't repeat yourself)
00009  ***********************************************************************/

00011 FunctorFactory* FunctorFactory::pinstance = 0;// initialize pointer
00012 
00013 FunctorFactory* FunctorFactory::getInstance() {
00014     if (pinstance == 0) {
00015         pinstance = new FunctorFactory; // create sole instance
00016     }
00017     return pinstance; // address of sole instance
00018 }

00021     //... perform necessary instance initializations

00024 Delta_Functor* FunctorFactory::create(std::string mapPosition) {
00025     FunctorFactory * _this = FunctorFactory::getInstance();
00026     _this->myFunctors[mapPosition] = new Delta_Functor();
00027     _this->completeFunctors[mapPosition] = 0;
00028     return _this->myFunctors[mapPosition];
00029 }
00030 
00031 Delta_Functor* FunctorFactory::create(std::string mapPosition, int start_time, int end_time, double start_value, double end_value, double exp) {
00032     FunctorFactory * _this = FunctorFactory::getInstance();
00033     _this->myFunctors[mapPosition] = new Delta_Functor( start_time, end_time, start_value, end_value, exp);
00034     _this->completeFunctors[mapPosition] = 0;
00035     return _this->myFunctors[mapPosition];
00036 }
00037 
00038 Delta_Functor* FunctorFactory::init(std::string mapPosition) {
00039     FunctorFactory * _this = FunctorFactory::getInstance();
00040     Delta_Functor * thisFunctor = _this->myFunctors[mapPosition];
00041     if (!thisFunctor) {
00042         //Doesn't exist due to caching, make a new one and remove the cache value
00043         FunctorFactory::create(mapPosition);
00044     }
00045     return _this->myFunctors[mapPosition];
00046 
00047 }
00048 
00049 //Get the value of the functor, if it is complete cache the result so that next loop we don't do that again
00050 double FunctorFactory::get(std::string mapPosition) {
00051     try {
00052         FunctorFactory * _this = FunctorFactory::getInstance();
00053 
00054         //Check to see if we have a cached value for this functor
00055         if (_this->completeFunctors[mapPosition]) {
00056             return _this->completeFunctors[mapPosition];
00057         }
00058 
00059         Delta_Functor * thisFunctor = _this->myFunctors[mapPosition];
00060         if (!thisFunctor) {
00061             throw "Object doesn't exist";
00062         }
00063         if (_this->myFunctors[mapPosition]->isComplete()) {
00064 
00065             _this->completeFunctors[mapPosition] = _this->myFunctors[mapPosition]->getValue();
00066             _this->myFunctors[mapPosition]->deleteChildren();
00067             delete _this->myFunctors[mapPosition];
00068             return _this->completeFunctors[mapPosition];
00069 
00070         }
00071 
00072         return _this->myFunctors[mapPosition]->getValue();
00073     }
00074     catch (char e[]) {
00075         printf("%s", e);
00076     }
00077 
00078 }
